highlights: Develop and maintain Drupal web applications that are used around the world
Utilize agile and scrum methodologies to develop Drupal/React based applications
Work with end users/product owners to determine system requirements and updates
POC/Lead development on several Drupal applications
Lead role on the full-stack platform team, guiding and mentoring intern developers on team
Implemented payment system using Stripe and login system using Facebook API
Ingegrated many RESTful APIs (Stripe, Facebook, Seatgeek, TickPick)
Discuss, analyze and strategize product design with UX team

Projects.name: Roadie
Projects.description: An application that allows the user to register, search for concerts using the setlist.fm API, displaying event information on a map using Mapbox's API. Using Spotify's API to gather information about each song and rating the setlist on its popularity. Plus linking each song to it's spoitfy url for easy listening.

Awards.summary: IT Service Management training through an end-to-end operating model for the creation, delivery and continual improvement of tech-enabled products and services
Awards.title: ITIL Foundations in IT Service Management
